steps.text:
Case records of the Massachusetts General Hospital. Case 12-2011. A 9-month-old 
boy with acute liver failure.
Fearing MK(1), Israel EJ, Sahai I, Rapalino O, Lisovsky M.

Author information:
(1)Pediatric Service, Massachusetts General Hospital, and Department of 
Pediatrics, Harvard Medical School, Boston, USA.
